subject: thank you notes (sydney)
body:
i'm thankful for being able to wake up every morning and go to my school, which is hard but reward, i love it here.

i'm thankful for having a group of girls that support me and accept me for who i am. it is not weird to talk about certain things around them and i appreciate that.

i'm thankful for my brothers. although much older and in their own houses, they are always there to help me go through things. other than lady problems i can talk to them about almost everything. They are my rocks.

\- sydney (4/12/16).
